mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sf.CODE AS 'authority' FROM user_role ur left join sys_role_menu srm on ur.role_id = srm.role_id left join sys_function sf on srm.menu_id = sf.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND sf.status = 'enabled'
SELECT sf.CODE AS 'authority' FROM sys_function sf WHERE sf.status = 'enabled'
